text: Hey Noel, do you by chance have the error?
Is it possible that it doesn't like the value of the property and not the property itself

here's the error. "Error:The graphql file /HubLMS-Enterprise/hubLMS/custom/application-tracker/graphql/my-course-for-status-cards-v2.graphql has invalid query. Errors are Invalid query. Query validations against schema failed and the errors are: `[ValidationError{validationErrorType=FieldUndefined, queryPath=[CRM, deal, associations, p_course_collection__deal_to_course, items, course_order_weight], message=Validation error of type FieldUndefined: Field 'course_order_weight' in type 'crm_p_course' is undefined @ 'CRM/deal/associations/p_course_collection__deal_to_course/items/course_order_weight', locations=[SourceLocation{line=13, column=13}], description='Field 'course_order_weight' in type 'crm_p_course' is undefined'}]`."
interesting, yeah it doesn't look like the DM is seeing that field for some reason. Ok, dumb question, but have you tried doing a reload?
yep, i've try reloading. tried creating a new file. I thought maybe the schema was cached on the backend and if I waited a bit, it would work. Was hoping this morning it would save.
I'm pretty sure it's a bug in DM. The schema it's validating against is out of date.
I think you're right, lets see if we can possible submit a ticket for the team to check on that
<@UAYBXDG4U> do you possibly know what could be causing this issue?
I submitted a ticket to HS support earlier. Looks like itâ€™s been escalated to internal team.
Beautiful! Sorry I couldn't be of more help
Yeah, I think this needs to go through the ticket flow.
